inclusion.criterion: Patients with histologically confirmed HER-2/neu-overexpressing adenocarcinoma of the breast
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: No histologic documentation of breast adenocarcinoma
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of autoimmune disease as detailed above
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient is a 12 year old girl with Turner syndrome, not eligible for the trial due to age and autoimmune disease history.
